alert.note: Alert for Spencer (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 07 at 3:03AM EST until March 07 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 36 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 AM CST THIS MORNING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ILLINOIS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHERN ILLINOIS HARDIN JOHNSON MASSAC POPE PULASKI IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST INDIANA SPENCER IN KENTUCKY THIS WATCH INCLUDES 22 COUNTIES IN WESTERN KENTUCKY BALLARD CALDWELL CALLOWAY CARLISLE CHRISTIAN CRITTENDEN DAVIESS FULTON GRAVES HENDERSON HICKMAN HOPKINS LIVINGSTON LYON MARSHALL MCCRACKEN MCLEAN MUHLENBERG TODD TRIGG UNION WEBSTER IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST MISSOURI MISSISSIPPI THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BARDWELL, BENTON, CADIZ, CALHOUN, CHARLESTON, CLINTON, DIXON, EDDYVILLE, ELIZABETHTOWN, ELKTON, GOLCONDA, GREENVILLE, HENDERSON, HICKMAN, HOPKINSVILLE, MADISONVILLE, MARION, MAYFIELD, METROPOLIS, MORGANFIELD, MOUND CITY, MURRAY, OWENSBORO, PADUCAH, PRINCETON, ROCKPORT, SMITHLAND, VIENNA, AND WICKLIFFE.
